Tests that XHR redirects preserve request body.
POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/network/resources/redirect.cgi?status=301&ttl=1
  actual http method was: POST
  request body: [LOST]

GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/network/resources/redirect.cgi?status=301&ttl=0
  actual http method was: GET
  request body: []

POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/network/resources/redirect.cgi?status=307&ttl=1
  actual http method was: POST
  request body: [PRESERVED]

POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/network/resources/redirect.cgi?status=307&ttl=0
  actual http method was: POST
  request body: [PRESERVED]
